Message:
My fortune telling and
the Church’s teachings—

these two things have made
people not only seek salvation,

but also work harder to
earn the future they desired.

This wasn’t accomplished
by my power alone...
I’m sure I have her to thank.

With her being
one of the Church’s elite,

there weren’t any chances
for the two of us to meet...

but I still remember
the loving look in her eyes.

Some years later,
I heard a rumor that
she became the Pope.

I couldn’t expect anything less
from someone of her character
and ability...

I think I’ll go and
congratulate her.

I was entertaining the idea
of visiting her...

when she suddenly came
knocking at my door.
